The system shall support logging events in Mars Coordinated Time ( MTC ) , such as " Booting in MARS - TZ ( sol 0 ) " , by mapping MTC to its corresponding Earth UTC offset using the ` martian_tz_map ` table ; if no valid mapping exists , the system shall raise an alert .
All extraterrestrial MTC - based log entries shall be stored in the ` logs_mars ` partition with a strict retention policy of seven Earth days .
Additionally , the system shall integrate with Grafana to include a dashboard panel labeled “ Mars Sol Lag ” to visualize time synchronization discrepancies between Earth UTC and MTC .
